1996 CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE
This table gives the location within the Zoning Ordinance of those sections of the 1996 Code, as updated through Ordinance No. 5828, which are included herein. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
